Comments.Message:
I have no clue what you're asking about Imp Moonkin Aura.

Imp Faerie Fire gives spell hit, not crit.

Imp. Moonkin Aura:
Now, you don't get spirit -> SP bonus when you check swift retribution. But if you have IMA talent, you get the bonus with swift ret.

Imp. Faerie Fire:
Please read talent tooltip carefully. Imp. FF also gives moonkin 3% crit. chance when target is afflicted by FF. (not to others)
actually Imp. Faerie Fire got changed and gives now 3% spell hit for anyone and 3% for one self.
Sounds like the buffs are correct, but that the Moonkin model isn't giving the full benefit of those talents, which is a Moonkin bug. Dopefish?

From wowhead.com:
Improved Faerie Fire
Your Faerie Fire spell also increases the chance the target will be hit by spell attacks by 3%, and increases the critical strike chance of your damage spells by 3% on targets afflicted by Faerie Fire.

IE, imp FF gives everyone 3% spellhit and the boomkin an additional 3% crit on the target.
Gah, disregard that, didn't notice that newest comments are at the top. :)

Sorry I'm late.  Here's the way this thing works: To get Improved Moonkin Form spell power bonus, you must have Moonkin Form checked and have points in Improved Moonkin Form.  Same thing goes for Improved Faerie Fire with Faerie Fire, which is why in the latest code, I have added code to show Faerie Fire on the buffs list.  I didn't tie Improved Moonkin Form spell power bonus to Improved Moonkin Form buff because, well, if you have the Moonkin Form buff and you have Improved Moonkin Form talent it's assumed that it's your own Moonkin Form.
